attributes.action: GIVE MORE FINANCIA L SUPPORT TO CARERS OF THE ELDERLY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PEOPLE LIKE MYSELF WHO RECIEVE CARERS ALLOWANCE FOR LOOKING AFTER THE ELDERLY SHOULD GET BETTER FINANCIAL HELP AS THE CARES ALLOWANCE IS A PITENCE.ALTHOUGH IT IS NOT  ALL ABOUT MONEY, IT IS NOT ENOUGH TO HELP YOU RUN A CAR  WHEN YOU HAVE AN ELDERLY PERSON TO GET FROM A 2B  WITH POOR MOBILITY ITS NO JOKE, THIS IS JUST  ONE FOR INSTANCE. PLUS IF YOUR PARTNER LOSES THEIR JOB AND YOU ARE ON THE DOLE ALTHOUGH YOU DONT HAVE IT TAKEN AWYAY ITS INCLUDED IN YOUR INCOME WHICH IS BAD . CARES IN THE UK  SAVE THE GOVERNMENT £87BILLION  AYEAR ITS A DISGRACE

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
